comment: Measures are continuous from below (bounded case): if ` E ` is a sequence of increasing measurable sets (with uniformly bounded measure) then the measure of the union is the union of the measure. This is Proposition 112C (e) of [Fremlin1] p. 16. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 8-Apr-2021.)
